annotations.description: All in all that was an entertaining 90 minutes of football thanks to some decent attacking play. Shakhtar Donetsk were dominant and more threatening of the two sides. It was a fairly one sided match. The home side played long passes and crosses into the box, while the away team's main priority was a flawless defence.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.
Yoshimar Yotun (Malmo FF) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Ovidiu Hategan no option but to blow his whistle.

Yoshimar Yotun (Malmo FF) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Ovidiu Hategan has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.
The ball spins up and hits the hand of Olexandr Kucher (Shakhtar) after he fails to control it and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.

Eduardo (Shakhtar) clutches his head in despair after he blew a huge opportunity! He received the ball from the free kick, took a good first touch and unleashed a projectile from close range to the left side of the goal, but Johan Wiland makes a nice save. The ball is out of play. Shakhtar Donetsk win a corner kick.

Anton Tinnerholm (Malmo FF) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.

annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Anton Tinnerholm (Malmo FF) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) gets to a rebound inside the six yard box and produces a header. He manages to put the ball inside the left post, and thus alter the score to 2:0.
Taison (Shakhtar) receives a precise low pass inside the box, controls it and sends it straight at Johan Wiland, who makes a comfortable save.
Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) makes a rough challenge and the referee blows for a foul.
Markus Rosenberg (Malmo FF) commits a foul and Ovidiu Hategan immediately signals a free kick.
Pa Konate (Malmo FF) slips through the defence and passes the ball in from the edge of the box. Yoshimar Yotun picks it up but loses it to one of the defenders.
The flag is raised and Eduardo (Shakhtar) is offside again, not for the first time today.

annotations.label: substitution

Bernard (Shakhtar) latches on to an accurate pass on the edge of the box and unleashes a strong shot towards goal, but his effort is denied by the well positioned keeper.

annotations.description: Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar) violates the laws of the game and is shown a yellow card by the referee, but it could have been a straight red as well.

annotations.description: Marlos (Shakhtar) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat. Shakhtar Donetsk force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.

The Shakhtar Donetsk players are exchanging some short passes and control the game at the moment, but one of the defending players steps in and intercepts the ball. Shakhtar Donetsk force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's a goal! Eduardo (Shakhtar) makes it 1:0. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Bernard and planted his close range header into the right side of the goal. Johan Wiland was helpless.
Markus Rosenberg (Malmo FF) wasted a great chance as he climbed high to connect with a cross from the free kick inside the penalty area. He produced a header which went wide of the left by a whisker.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) sends Johan Wiland the wrong way and fires the penalty into the middle of the goal!
Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.

annotations.label: y-card

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Ovidiu Hategan interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Kari Arnason (Malmo FF). PENALTY to Shakhtar Donetsk! Almost the entire opposition team is gathered around the referee and complaining. However, the decision has been made and it's final.

Both sides have been very active in the first half, providing the fans with an exciting show. It was a fairly one sided opening 45 minutes, with Shakhtar Donetsk much the better side better so far. The home team play long ball football, while the away side focuses on defending and lets the opposition keep possession.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of today's match has just finished.
Kari Arnason (Malmo FF) leaps highest to meet the resulting set piece and sends his header way off target.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Vladimir Rodic (Malmo FF) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat. It will be a corner kick for Malmo FF.

Decent spell from Malmo FF here and they keep the pressure on until one of the defending players steps in. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Malmo FF will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 3 min. of stoppage time to be played.
What a big chance! Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) picks up an inch perfect pass inside the box and fires the ball just over the crossbar.

annotations.description: Marlos (Shakhtar) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.

Vladimir Rodic (Malmo FF) changes the direction of the ball using his hand, but he is angry when the referee gives a foul against him.

annotations.description: The total shots for both teams statistics – 24:6.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Marlos (Shakhtar) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
Shakhtar Donetsk are showing great team chemistry. They are passing the ball around seamlessly but finally one of the defending players makes an interception. Now Shakhtar Donetsk have a corner.

Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar) attempts to convert a lofted cross as he jumps high and heads the ball down to the middle of the goal. Johan Wiland shows his brilliant reflexes and pulls off a glorious save to stop the ball from hitting the net.
A more precise finish was all that was needed for this set play to have been a success. Yaroslav Rakitsky (Shakhtar) received the ball far out and fired a projectile which went yards over the bar.
Ovidiu Hategan blows his whistle after Enoch Adu (Malmo FF) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! The rebound fell to Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar) and he fired home from close range. The score is 1:0.
Johan Wiland makes a difficult save to deny Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar), who attempted to score with a header from inside the box.

Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar) can't believe his eyes as he blows an opportunity from close range. It looked really simple and he only needed to tap the ball in, but he failed. The ball goes well wide of the right post. Hang your head in shame son.
Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) wins himself enough space to meet the resulting corner on the edge of the box and fires the ball at goal, but the keeper does well to stop his effort.

Nikola Djurdjic (Malmo FF) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the middle of the goal. Anton Kanibolotsky guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.
Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar) had a good opportunity when he latched on to a cross from the wing, but his header wasn't accurate at all and the ball went well wide of the right post.
Bernard (Shakhtar) was all set to receive a beautiful pass into a promising position. However, one of the defenders makes a timely clearance.
Chance! Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) was in a good position inside the box, but he couldn't connect with the pass as it was overhit.
Ovidiu Hategan blows for a foul after Anton Tinnerholm (Malmo FF) was too aggressive in the battle for the ball.

The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate. Shakhtar Donetsk force a corner. They send men into the box.

annotations.label: injury

Marlos (Shakhtar) gets the ball and drives a shot high over the bar from the edge of the area.
The ball falls to Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) on the edge of the box, but his shot goes well wide of the goal.
Marcio Azevedo (Shakhtar) sends a chip pass into the box, but Johan Wiland is quickest to intercept the ball.
Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.
Markus Rosenberg (Malmo FF) receives a well played pass inside the penalty area and shoots. He sends the ball into orbit.
A nice lofted cross finds Bernard (Shakhtar) unmarked. He takes an excellent touch and gets in a shot that goes towards the middle of the net. An easy save for the goalkeeper, though.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: We now know the starting lineups. You can find them in the match details of this match.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

All in all that was an entertaining 90 minutes of football thanks to some decent attacking play. Shakhtar Donetsk were dominant and more threatening of the two sides. It was a fairly one sided match. The home side played long passes and crosses into the box, while the away team's main priority was a flawless defence.
